sentences.en: A ministry official described the report as groundless.
sentences.cn: 一位部级官员称这篇报道纯属子虚乌有。

sentences.en: Any infectious disease must be notified at once to the Health Ministry.
sentences.cn: 出现任何传染病都必须马上通知卫生部.

sentences.en: Converted in his early teens, he entered the ministry (= started working as a church leader ) in 1855.
sentences.cn: 他十三四岁皈依基督教，1855年当上牧师。

sentences.en: He immediately fired off an angry letter to his ministry colleagues.
sentences.cn: 他立即给部里的同事发了一封怒气冲冲的信。

sentences.en: He was bathed in glory on the day he became the Ministry.
sentences.cn: 在成为部长的那一天他感到无上光荣.

sentences.en: His ministry is among the poor.
Mr. White occupies an important position in the Ministry of Education.
sentences.cn: 怀特先生在教育部里担任要职.

sentences.en: So what prompted him to enter the ministry?
sentences.cn: 那么，是什么促使他成为牧师的呢？

sentences.en: That must be somebody from the Ministry of Education.
sentences.cn: 那一定是教育部里的人.

sentences.en: The Foreign Ministry has issued a flat denial of any involvement.
sentences.cn: 外交部已经坚决否认参与过此事。

sentences.en: The Ministry desperately tried to hush up the whole affair.
sentences.cn: 部里拼命想隐瞒整个事件。

sentences.en: The Ministry is being obsessively secretive about the issue.
sentences.cn: 该部对这个问题讳莫如深。

sentences.en: The Ministry of Finance consistently overestimated its budget deficits.
sentences.cn: 财政部一贯高估预算赤字.

sentences.en: The schools are regularly visited by officials from the Ministry of Education.
sentences.cn: 教育部的官员们定期视察各学校.

sentences.en: This new ministry was being created with zero assets and zero liabilities.
sentences.cn: 这个新部委正在筹建，既无资产也无负债。

phrases.tran_cn: 信息产业部；产业部；资讯产业部

trans.tran_en: a government department that is responsible for one of the areas of government work, such as education or health
